subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets traded the 34-year-old Pete Kendall to the Redskins on Aug. 23 for a conditional draft pick rather than pay him the $1 million raise he was seeking.
snippet: The Jets traded the 34-year-old Pete Kendall to the Redskins on Aug. 23 for a conditional draft pick rather than pay him the $1 million raise he was seeking.
